attributes.action: REDUCE or at least prevent the growth of AIR TRAFFIC in the UK and there for reduce sound, sight and air pollution.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Air traffic is increasing and with it noise pollution, visual pollution and probably most importantly air pollution.

With global warming threatening and the ice caps already dissapearing the time to act is now. Aviation creates a huge amount of CO2, which is the major contribution for climate change. 

Also it is difficult to find anywhere, even in the countryside, where you are free of noise pollution from planes.

Lots of the domestic flights around the UK are unnecessary as trains can take you to most plaes in britatain cheaper and sometimes quicker than planes.

Reducing traffic or preventing the growth may also reduce the need for airport expantion.

Please sign this petition and send the Prime Minister a clear message that we need to act now!
